ClickFix Wiki

Code execution by social engineering instructions

HomeMitigations

conhost.exe

Windows CLI

Activate Windows

Activate Windows for free with these steps:

  1. 1. Press Win-R on your keyboard.
  2. 2. Type conhost and press Enter.
  3. 3. Press Ctrl-V to paste the desired configuration.
  4. 4. Press Enter to submit.

Activate Windows

UAC

Activate Windows for free with these steps:

  1. 1. Press Win on your keyboard.
  2. 2. Type conhost and press Ctrl+Shift+Enter.
  3. 3. Click Yes when prompted
  4. 4. Press Ctrl-V to paste the desired configuration.
  5. 5. Press Enter to submit.

ClickFix lures can lead to malware and computer viruses. If you see text like this online, it's likely a scam.
